website_summaries.verdict: A great addition to the DIYer's power tool collection and a good lightweight multi-tool for contractors, as well. 20V provides a satisfactory ramp-up from smaller 12V multi-tools and is more than adequate for cutting through sheetrock and light wood. The rechargeable battery offers versatility and convenience.
pros: Quick-change lever allows for keyless blade changes
Cuts through sheetrock “like a hot knife through butter” with minimal dust kicked up
Users can switch from the included 2 Ah battery to a 4 Ah battery if longer power is needed
cons: Some reports of faulty batteries that lasted only one charge
Tends to run loud, and vibration is sometimes an issue
Kit includes a few basic blades and sanders only

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Bought it 7 months ago and only used it about 15 minutes max and it quit. I'll try to have it repaired as it is still under warranty. For a so-called top-of-the-line tool, I was very surprised that it failed. I've had tools for 30-40 years and they are still going strong. Very disappointed! Now I'll find out if it is worth the hassle to have it fixed!
customer_reviews.author: MyGoil

customer_reviews.title: Love Dewalt!
customer_reviews.text: RANT Ahead - I bought a rigid multi tool originally. Bought into their lifetime service agreement. I purchased 3 of their 6 ah batteries and thought I was set. I was willing to sacrifice with a lower quality tool for that LSA. The box literally had "Free batteries for life" written on it, even though the tool did not come with a battery. Then when I registered everything the batteries had a limited warranty. That box lied!! I promptly returned all my rigid tools and replaced them with Dewalt. SO MUCH BETTER. The dewalt multi tool works great for smaller detail cuts, I used it on a subfloor replacement project. Just dont push hard, let the vibration do the work.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Did what I wanted it to do
customer_reviews.text: I recently put a fiberglass roof on a 30 foot tiny house. The fiberglass wrapped over the trim on the sides and left a ragged edge at the bottom of the trim. Riding along the bottom of the trim, this tool zipped right through several layers of fiberglass. Saved me hours of doing it some other way whatever that would have been. I tried to cut through a weld joint on steel but the tool asked me to please use the angle grinder instead. I like this tool and am looking for other ways to use it now that I own it. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Finicky Fred

customer_reviews.title: Great tool,  can't afford not to have it in your toolbox!
customer_reviews.text: We are putting down new floors in our entire house and replacing some drywall. As part of the upgrade we have to cut out the existing particle board underlayment in order to access the subfloor. This is perfect to cutting up to the edge of the wall, cuts through nails and screws to pull up underlayment easily, and scraps off the old linoleum with ease. It's also does a great job cutting drywall, especially near the inside corners. And the sanding attachment is a time saver when you want to sand in tightest spots. Love this tool, it's saved me so much time and effort during our upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Noisy BumbleBuzzer.
customer_reviews.text: I've already used this cordless oscillating tool more in one week than the Ryobi corded one I've owned for over a year. It's too bad DeWalt skimped on the design process. Yes, I understand that being cordless it should be as light as possible but slightly different materials would make this machine operate somewhere under the "heavy metal rock concert" decibel zone. As it is now my neighbors are too well aware of when I'm trying to do something. But DeWalt has a good product line around the 20V Lithium batteries so integrating it with other tools will be a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: JonnyLotto

customer_reviews.title: What a versatile tool
customer_reviews.text: Got this when I saw my contractor cut into the sheet rock like it was butter. I am converting all my tools to Dewalt 20V. I have now used this a couple of times where I can imagine what I would have done otherwise. For example, I installed some New Age cabinets in my garage that has molding along the floor. I needed the cabinet to fit snugly against the wall and needed to cut the molding in those spots. What other tool would be able to push in and cut the molding without removing the molding first. It worked great and took less than a minute per cut. The tool is light, powerful, and easy to control.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I can’t speak for the ergonomics and performance of the DEWALT DCS356D1 20V XR as I had to return it immediately. The trigger control did not work properly, and instead of smoothly varying the speed, the speed jumped around dramatically when squeezing the trigger. This is my first DeWALT and I was hoping for a better first experience. I have Bosch, Makita and Milwaukee tools, and so far, the Bosch tool has the smoothest control, with the Makita and Milwaukee close behind and the DeWalt dead last. It could have been a bad sample, so I’m hoping my next experience with DeWalt is better.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Accessory arrangement in their case.
customer_reviews.text: Just got the tool. The little bit I've used it makes me think it's a solid nicely built tool which will be very handy. In trying to sort out how the accessories fit in their case, I found a good solution on the page which is the case sold separately.  Here is how I arranged mine. Also I wanted to mention that some reviews said the depth guide was missing. Mine came with one. And some mentioned theirs arrived with the smaller 1.5 Ah battery. Mine is what the description said would be included, the 2 Ah battery. The charger is a DCB112.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best decision I have made in months!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! I had been eyeing it up for a couple months debating between the corded and cordless. I ordered this a week before we started our kitchen reno. Can I just tell you, it is the BEST! It can cut through anything, sand the weirdest crevasse, remove grout...you name it. It made the hard detail work so much easier. I recommend this tool to any handy at home person. It pays for itself in one project and saves a lot of aggravation. I would recommend buying the sanding finger if you're doing detail work. It's like $9 and well worth it. The battery lasts for a few days of continuous use.
customer_reviews.author: K8girl24

customer_reviews.title: DeWalt Brushless - great
customer_reviews.text: I have all DeWalt cordless tools in the Max ecosystem. so worth the money. after my harbor freight multi-tool (oscilating) nuked i decided i needed to invest in a good one. no brainer to buy the Dewalt. One complaint? comes with a box with tools. that plastic box has notches and detents and dohickeys but I have yet to find a guide or figure out where things "go" in that box. so it's all just thrown in there. that aside great tool cuts trim wonderfully. I love the stop guide. removed a cracked tile the other day with a grout blade.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. D.

customer_reviews.title: Another great DeWalt tool. Well made and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I have many DeWalt tools. I am not committed to this brand as they don't always have what I want. But, I always check DeWalt as I have a lot of their batteries. This is a great addendum to any person who needs another handy portable tool. The tool come with multiple blades and is both powerful and ergonomic. Battery power makes the use of any tool a simpler task. This one is great to use
customer_reviews.author: HomerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: One awesome tool
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant to buy this tool because it's a little pricey and I probably won't use it that often but, I had to install a floating floor which needed a ton trim work to be cut in place and this tool is awesome! I do not regret buying this thing. Some tools just can't do what this thing does and it has so many uses. It's loud when cutting but it just works great. A++
customer_reviews.author: DERB.0

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a Work Horse and Cordless if Great.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is easier to use than my Fein corded saw and has plenty of power with battery. Think I may get a second battery however but batteries seem to last a long time. My only issue with this item is the blades are not compatible with most of the other saws and could not find an adapter and needs to have Dewalt blades which are expensive and I have tons of blades for my Fein saw. Overall however, I am well please and only gave it a four rating because of compatibility of blades.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dale A. Stagg

customer_reviews.title: The Problem Solver
customer_reviews.text: Although I don't use this tool every day, I am so glad that I own it. It is very versatile, and has gotten me out of many problems and binds. The LED light is brilliant. The tool does have a slight vibration in the handle when in use, and is very loud, so I'd recommend using hearing protection during use. It seems like every time I use it I'm in a confined space, so the noise is amplified. This is a great tool, and I recommend it highly. I would certainly buy it again if I ever needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Boyer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: how would I live without this tool doing a flooring job changing from carpet to lvp? Used it for hours doing my flooring. The light helps working on the floors in the closet. Using the sander and saw all the time and removed tile and rubber moldings in the bathrooms and kitchen with the scraper (bought separately). Saved hours and allowed me to use my energy doing a nicer more professional job rather than fighting every detail. I have lots of tools and of you need this type of tool it is the most useful thing I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Larson

customer_reviews.title: Love at first oscillation!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite tool. I have owned DeWalt corded and cordless tools for decades and always been happy with them. I have never owned an oscillating tool though. i bought it while painting my house. It works great to remove caulk, even up weathered siding along the roof line, and scraping and sanding in those tight corners. So far I really like it and am happy to add it to my DeWalt collection. I see it coming in handy for a lot of hard to reach detail work in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Of All Trades

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to remove old tile from bath and kitchen, it's unbelievably easy to use. The blades that come with the kit are not the greatest. The battery is only 2Ah, could have been better (like a FlexVolt).
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Retiling bathroom floor
customer_reviews.text: So far in the month that I've owned this tool, I've used it for cutting a screw clamp from a defective garden hose, for removing grout, removing thinset and concrete board, minor sanding of a subfloor, precision cutting of baseboard trim, cutting PVC pipe, and cutting a nail head. It does everything it says it does and more. My only complaint is that the blades do wear out fairly quickly especially if used for cutting metal. The bag and enclosed blade case make staying organized very simple. I feel like a pro using this multi-tool kit!
customer_reviews.author: WendyB

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using an Oscillating tool and it has worked great so far! I am able to sand difficult areas, cut and notch out difficult wood cuts and get rid of nails a lot quicker. Hope it performs just as well in the long haul. DeWalt has a solid reputation with power tools and now I understand why! Great tool! Keep up the great work! Thank you Amazon for delivering it so quickly!
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: I feel a good way to describe a tool like this is "extremely ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this device to cut through soft metal tubing and wood, and have also used it to sand small wooden projects. I feel a good way to describe a tool like this is "extremely large dremel". It's extremely satisfying to use and also extremely useful for random projects. Great ergonomics as well. For my purposes (one-off projects, not extensive house work), I find this more useful than a circular saw and it's my most used item next to the DeWalt 20V flashlight and drill. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: C. YangTop Contributor: Arduino

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is just proposperously useful. I replaced some damaged hardwood floor using this; it cuts wood, it cuts ring shank nails that didn't come out. It cuts screws that rusted into the joist, and it sands the joints so the new pieces fit tightly. Also it came with another battery and charger, which is always nice
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little tool.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little tool. It will do the job very well, I use it for cutting door frames before laying flooring, it's fast and strong. Ot comes with a very nice little box to keep all accessories and parts organized in the bag. Only downside is the 2 mAh battery that will not last for very long.
customer_reviews.author: Marchezini

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit for my husband. He absolutely loves it. He had been looking at this in the stores, but it you had to buy the battery separately, which made the product too expensive. This kit is very reasonably priced on Amazon and you get way more in the kit, which you have to also buy separately in the store. My husband builds cabinetry and uses it to cut little notches in the backs of the drawers for the drawer runners. He raves about this tool every time he uses it.
customer_reviews.author: SAW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Wish I would have purchased it a long ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Wish I would have purchased it a long time ago. Battery life is excellent. And surprisingly I am able to make precision cuts in situations I could not get any other type of saw. Last week I needed to cut a stud between walls. With this saw I was able to reach into the wall with the saw an cut the stud well below the hole I cut in the wall. Absolutely perfect. I've purchased several after market blade kits. It needs to be said again.... excellent tool.
customer_reviews.author: Pravda

customer_reviews.title: I would give it 4 star just because 2AH batteries ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 4 star just because 2AH batteries are too small for more than 30 minutes of usage. Get a 6AH battery. Check the accessories. It came with only 3 basic tools. 2 cutters and a sander. Sander head was too big ( 3 5/8 ") for what I was trying to do( needed 3" or less to fit in between railings). If I had to re-do, I will go with dremmel MM45-06. That's just me! I am not a brand loyalist. I am all about performance,precision and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: ... calls it a saxophone because that what it sounds like when someone is learning to play
customer_reviews.text: Wife calls it a saxophone because that what it sounds like when someone is learning to play. Love the battery that lets you see how much charge is left. I didn't know it was a brushless motor until I got it. Of course that is the newest thing and being brushless makes this tool (and all others),more powerful.Does the job and I don't think I had to charge the battery again since I've had it. Great tool and a must have for any serious builder,renovator or handyman. I love DeWalt tools and consider tham professional grade and the best.What color tool do you see the most on T.V? Yep.
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool and accessories
customer_reviews.text: Not the type of thing I use all the time but comes in handy for all kinds of little tasks. More than you'd think. Great little addition to my D. 20v tool array. The quick on/off blade feature is awesome. So much more convenient than the other oscillating tool I had. Nice tool bag and I love the blade box that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Galvin

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt Oscillating Multi-tool
customer_reviews.text: We are remodeling a vacation home and my son recommended this tool to my husband. He has used it several times since he got it and likes it very much. He even went out an bought more pieces for it. He has cut wood close to the wallboard, sanded tight areas, and several other tasks. I think he would definitely recommend this tool.
customer_reviews.author: dblove

customer_reviews.title: Tool that was needed
customer_reviews.text: I have looked at these for years putting it off then we purchased a house to renovate. This tool has got more use in the demo of the inside of the house than the hammer. I have purchased many different styles of blades and keep finding different uses for it.
customer_reviews.author: Super Cool Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: Have wanted one for a long time. Really powerful, decent battery life, great for so many different projects - just used it for the initial stripping of rust off a smoker. How’s well with my dewalt drill and impact driver and now I have spare battery charger and bag. Great gift too!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R. Venable

customer_reviews.title: Best tool I own
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite tool. I wish I had purchased one of these years ago. I have standardized on dealt for all of my cordless tools and this one did not disappoint. I purchased it when I remodeled my bathroom and used it more than any other power tool. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: The battery life goes pretty far, but i will say you will want ...
customer_reviews.text: Ive used a couple of different type of multi tools, from fein to makita (both corded, which usually gets more power, compared to my other one thats a 12v craftsman), and i have to say, this thing rules. I use it at my job to cut siding out and trim back liners for windows, and it holds its own versus the corded ones. The battery life goes pretty far, but i will say you will want another battery to have on hand if your going to be using this on a job, but between 2 of them (one on the charger when it dies) i was able to use the bad boy all day.
customer_reviews.author: ian

customer_reviews.title: Every Household needs one
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough great things about this product. This is like a handyman's dream tool. With all of the different heads and attachments, it makes quick work out of cutting/sanding just about anything. I had a contractor working at my house who had one of these (the corded version) and I decided that I needed to get one after I saw him sanding with it, cutting vinyl flooring and installing it, cutting holes in the back of vanity's for piping, cutting pipes, etc. etc. etc. I got a great deal on it, and I never looked back. Buy this!!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Vee

customer_reviews.title: Secret weapon
customer_reviews.text: It's a tool you really don't need, bit once you have you'll find it is so handy. Flush cuts are a breeze, the sanding pad lets you get into tighter spots, cuts grout, amazing as a power scraper. Just fun. Not super battery thirsty either.
customer_reviews.author: Houston

customer_reviews.title: Great all-around tool
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for specific repairs and now find that I use it all the time! Lightweight, versatile, with the carry case makes it easy to transport. I added additional batteries on my own and always have power for projects. This is a tool that can grow with you and the DeWalt family of tools offers lots of options that I now use.
customer_reviews.author: preop

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to have when you need it.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this tool to do odd cutting (baseboard, trim, wood, etc..) and has functioned as advertised. I haven't really used it to do any sanding...so I can't speak to that. Great piece of tool that just feels good to hold. The toggle is great for when you need to hold it in different positions and the light is positioned very well. This tool is not a must for the average home owner, but I did quite a bit of remodeling when I bought my home and this tool has been really handy. The bag it comes is nice and the hard case is good to hold all the misc pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Iz

customer_reviews.title: Multi use oscillating tool
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after watching a video on carpet removal. I was removing 5 rooms of carpet. The oscillating tool cut through carpet like butter. Helpers commented on the superiority of the brand. I then used it to trim down the top of a fence post. What will I use it for next...carving the Thanksgiving Turkey?
customer_reviews.author: Larella Moore

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this tool few months ago. Already used it to cut wood several times. Also used it to polish the wood and meetal. This is really good and universal tool. I recommend to buy second battery, so you don't get stack when first one is discharged. It happens to me once, needed to wait while it charged before continue.
customer_reviews.author: Kostya K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Multi-Tool.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Multi-Tool. Working fine so far. Decent selection of attachments - 2 cutting attachments , detail/ triangular iron shaped sanding mount with a variety of form fitting sandpaper grits supplied. Depth guide for more accurate cutting is also included. And a DeWalt case/ plastic box to hold it all of the attachments. Also a universal adapter for other off-brand attachments. Nylon carry bag too! Whew!
customer_reviews.author: Phantom Critic

customer_reviews.title: DEWALT 20V MAX XR Oscillating Tool Kit
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased, easy to handle, works well and holds up to extreme use. Included battery is a disappointment, barely holds up and just bogs down on heavy use, if you buy this kit go with the bigger battery and charger.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy E.

customer_reviews.title: Variable speed trigger is bad ass. Holds up against other brands
customer_reviews.text: Variable speed trigger is bad ass. Holds up against other brands. Only issue is the DeWalt adapter doesn't fit most Fein tool blades out there. You either have to buy the expensive DeWalt blades or make sure you look at what you're buying. Even with that issue I love this thing. Fits well in the hand, and doesn't drain batteries.
customer_reviews.author: GOAT

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: So far I've used it mostly sanding and light cutting, but its been amazingly efficient and having no cord to work around is wonderful. I'm currently waiting on my other attachments to come in so I can get into some other tasks. All around this tool does the job for me, and with the wide variety of attachments I can only assume it will get better.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Just do it, I love this tool.
customer_reviews.text: After using this tool, I don't know how we ever managed without it. With all the attachments and the versatility, if you don't have one and you're thinking about it, stop and buy it. You'll be glad you did. I have had Ryobi tools for awhile but worked a lot of overtime and treated myself to Dewalt 20volt brushless tools and although the Ryobi tools lasted through a lot more abuse then they ever should have especially for the price, I think I'm a Dewalt guy for life.
customer_reviews.author: StreetCop

customer_reviews.title: How did we live without these things?
customer_reviews.text: Love it, love it, love it! I’ve On a different brand for a long time, it was OK, then gave up the ghost. DeWalt tools have done right by me for a long time so I bought this one. Build quality is fantastic, it’s quiet for what it does, comes with lots of attachments, it just works. My favorite part, swapping blades takes one and a half seconds, it really makes a big difference when you’re doing tasks
customer_reviews.author: Wolfpack901

customer_reviews.title: This is a fun, useful, sturdy, and reliable tool.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun, useful, sturdy, and reliable tool. As with other DeWalt products, the quality is excellent. I anticipate the lifespan of this product will be lengthy, which is what I depend upon. I'm glad I purchased this tool. I'm told other less expensive oscillators work just as well, but I've purchased many DeWalt products over the years and they've never let me down. I'd highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mateo_MacGyver

customer_reviews.title: This multi-tool is awesome! It has plenty of power and a bunch ...
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer: I am not a professional, just a weekend warrior. This multi-tool is awesome! It has plenty of power and a bunch of convenient design features that I didn't even realize I needed! The LED light is fantastic, and the quick-change accessory feature makes setting up and breaking down a breeze. DeWalt has not let me down with their quality and durability yet. I highly recommend this OMT!
customer_reviews.author: T. Fidura

customer_reviews.title: Like a Dewalt...what can you say more?
customer_reviews.text: For the same price as the box store, I got a carrying case and lots of accessories that were not included at the box store. Showed up quickly. I would have liked a broad head attachment rather than two narrow head ones.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: The Swiss Army knife of the 21st century!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tool, great for around the home use and tough enough to earn its place at my job site. Been using this to help hang crown molding and over 8 months of testing and this tool is still in my top five tools I use everyday! That’s the thing about it you don’t really understand how many time you can use this gem of a tool, it will for sure simplify your life both on the job site!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Horner

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, which I bought one of these years ago.
customer_reviews.text: I had a contractor doing work in my kitchen who had one of these tools and decided I needed to get one myself which I just used for the first time the other day. The variety of ways you can use this thing along with how easy it is to change tool heads makes me wish I had purchased it much sooner. The tool itself is typical quality Dewalt and given the price of the tool, accessory pack and most importantly the XR battery made it a no brainer to scoop up this deal.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!  Battery gives balance.
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I chose the option with the battery; the battery gives perfect balance and prevents hand fatigue. Almost forgot: It does a marvelous job, and I'm so glad I have one of these. Great invention.
customer_reviews.author: TALKS TO LIONS

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tool for cutting out grout. Even has a light built in to help the operator see what he or she is doing. It did a fantastic job in cutting out the grout in a custom shower!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great tool. Vast improvement over the cut out tool. So easy to cut out Sheetrock for power outlets. Used it to trim back cedar battens and the trimmed out several windows. The variable speed is very helpful. Just wish with the blades they would label them more clearly on the actual blade.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel G. Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Shut up and give'em your money!!
customer_reviews.text: It is an awesome tool, really good. Good trigger speed regulation, low vibration on your hand, weight is really manageable and well balanced, but loud enough for its power; cuts can get really loud. Also the run time with the 2.0A battery included it's all you need for a day's work. The one thing I really don’t like it's the guide system, it's a really good idea but not so well executed. The fastening screw on it its really weak, maybe the Allen wrench included it's not the right size but it damaged the head on the second time I tried fastening the guide to the tool. Above all it's an excellent tool and the kit is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: BBGigante

customer_reviews.title: Should have got this long ago.
customer_reviews.text: I have started using my new 20V Multi Tool and absolutely love it. The quick change blade set up is such an improvement over my old allen wrench multi tool. Love the light, the control button, the feel and how light it is. No complaints and couldn't be happier. Thanks DeWalt and Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: JJLLBB

customer_reviews.title: A versatile tool every DIY individual should own!
customer_reviews.text: First time using this oscillating tool, I was amazed at the convenience and versatility this multi-tool has to offer. The saw attachment tackles difficult or even impossible cuts with ease. Meanwhile, converting it to a portable sander or other tool takes less than 15 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: DEWALT DCS355D1 20V XR Lithium-Ion Oscillating Multi-Tool Kit
customer_reviews.text: This is the first oscillating multi tool I have ever used but I absolutely love it. We have used it for cutting pieces from decking boards and tongue and groove boards and it works great. We have not tried everything that came with it but the things we have tried we are very happy with. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accessory Kit is a little misleading
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice tool set but be aware that the 28 piece accessory kit counts each individual piece of the sandpaper so you really only get a couple blades and will need to purchase metal and scraping blades at least to make it multipurpose.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Wrong!
customer_reviews.text: I mainly ordered it because of the fast charger and the xr 2ah battery but it didn’t come with either! It came with the standard charger and a 1.3ah battery. I would not order this. You can find the multi tool itself used or new cheaper anywhere for up to 50$. Highly disappointed I didn’t get the battery and charger that was advertised. Multi tool and accessories and bag itself was great as expected but I was more interested in the fast charger and battery.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Endless uses
customer_reviews.text: I finally had an excuse to buy this (needed to make a clean square cut out) and since then I have found it useful all over. For example, using the scraper blade to clean my mower deck. It is a great tool, variable speed is great and battery life is normal for a high power tool similar to dewalt cordless circular saw.
customer_reviews.author: TheSelf

customer_reviews.title: Saved me a ton of hand sanding!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help cut down on the amount of time it would take to sand outdoor trim around house windows, but it has quickly become my go to tool if I have to make a quick random cut. Relatively easy on the battery unless you’re running it constantly for sanding. The LED light on the top is also a nice feature. Would definitely recommend especially if you have already bought into the DeWalt 20V tools
customer_reviews.author: Cody T

customer_reviews.title: DeWalt Quality
customer_reviews.text: You will wonder how you lived without this tool. So many uses for this. This has paid for itself several times with unlimited tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I tried one of my friends mulit-tool. His was a Milwaukee. I chose Dewalt because of the bang for your buck. The tool battery does not last. I do not know if it is the tool or the defective battery. Wish I would not have bought Dewalt and just stuck with Milwaukee. As a single income and not able to get a refund this hurts. I will not buy Dewalt again.
customer_reviews.author: jm

customer_reviews.title: Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: Don't even think about this one, just go buy it. This tool is absolutely incredible. I,ve been an Electrician for some 37 years now, and do use Dewalt as my choice of tools, this thing is the best New tool Dewalt has mad in a very long time! If it doesn't work, and work great, it doesn't get a good review from me. What else can I say! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Scoville

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works great, the battery life is good and the versatility is good. Enough power to do most any job. As with most DeWalt tools they work good but you pay for the name also!
customer_reviews.author: JCM

customer_reviews.title: Tool with good features
customer_reviews.text: The weight and balance of the tool is good; the 3-speed selector switch saves both battery and cutting blade life. The 2AH battery provides adequate capacity for only a short period of time-I use a 4AH or 5AH battery for most cutting jobs.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Best tool i own
customer_reviews.text: There is so much you can do with this. I wish I would have known about it years ago. Build quality is dewalt and the accesory pack is more than enough to get you going
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Seamans

customer_reviews.title: Great multi purpose tool
customer_reviews.text: This tool has multiple purposes, cutting different material and sanding does great job on both. It’s a must have for your tool box. Battery life is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool! This one is my 4th and it is by far the best! The fact that is cordless is even better! I use virtually every day! Upgrades from my previous tools also include the light in the front and a trigger lock for when in use and for when not in use. The bag is great to carry similar tools for the project, and the supply box is the perfect and convenient size.
customer_reviews.author: FSCF

customer_reviews.title: Battery terrible
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the tool but unfortunately after 2 months of normal use the battery went out on him and just stopped charging. I hopping dewalt will make this right.
customer_reviews.author: Giles Family

customer_reviews.title: The most ergonomic and best value out there.
customer_reviews.text: This is simply the best orbital tool out there. No I haven't used a festool but I have used many feins. It has an excellent blade change mechanism it comes with a roller depth guide. It feels very natural and comfortable in the hand. other brands I have looked at are heavy and bulky .
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Conant

customer_reviews.title: Good tool, great features
customer_reviews.text: These DeWalt cordless tools are great, in fact I think they perfome better than their corded tools!! The no tool blade installation is just plain superb, and the adapters for different brands blades is great! I have an entire line of DeWalt cordless tools 18 volts and 20 volts and they are all great!
customer_reviews.author: only4me

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for most DIY needs
customer_reviews.text: Pretty amazing tool. Tip I wish I knew: for plunge cuts, rock the tool left and right so that the saw dust can escape. Otherwise it will start to smoke. Never had any flames, but stinky smoke for sure. All in all, a great tool. Get the blade kit too, you will be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Conor

customer_reviews.title: Nice and handy... wow
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought this one earlier. I used it for a project where a corded tool would be very uncomfortable. This tool helped me accomplish it. Very nice tool and easy too handle. The blades cut very well the composite wood and solid wood panels. The guide that came with the tool was very helpful to keep the exact distance/depth of the cut. Since I have other Dewalt 20V XR power tools I also have plenty of extra batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Prime

customer_reviews.title: Great tool from Dewalt
customer_reviews.text: Another great tool from DeWalt. I used it today to remove a quantity of plastic base molding from my bathrooms. It made the job easy to do. The blade attachments mounted and removed easily, the variable speed feature makes the tool even more useful. I recommend it to anyone who has a use for it.
customer_reviews.author: CSTEINER

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Can do so many jobs.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and works great! Never realized how useful this sort of tool is. I've been using it everyday on a project since I received it. Dependable and charges pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: rdm

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, but allen wrench a little off
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool! My only complaint would be that the allen wrench that comes with it to change the blade is slightly too big and doesn't sit all of the way down in the fittings. I ended up using one of my own allen wrenches that is the right size and it works much better.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lawton

customer_reviews.title: Very handy, versatile, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: One those tools that you say - I don't know how I lived with out it. :-) Very versatile and easy to use. A very good sander and the triangle head helps a lot at times, like when you have a tight corner. Battery life is good. I have a lot of Dewalt tools.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to any collection
customer_reviews.text: Works great, and a better price than local stores. This tool may not be branded as a tool for specific activities, but it continues to prove itself as a great tool for many random tasks. I continue to find uses for it that save me time and energy. This is a great addition to any collection that does not already have an oscillating tool.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent oscillating tool
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little oscillating tool. I have the grand daddy Fein, but use this the most. I wouldn't suggest using it for extended periods. That's what my Fein is for.
customer_reviews.author: Freedom Builders

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it for the sander
customer_reviews.text: For the most part this is an awesome tool!! The only thing I don’t care for is the sanding head. The Velcro was glued on, I’m not sure what happened to it, but after the first use the glued on pad just fell off.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Worrell

customer_reviews.title: This was an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace an older corded Rockwell. Love the quick change system and it locks the blade in place. I had problems with the screw of the Rockwell always loosing up, but not this Delta. I do theater carpentry and don't use an oscillating tool a lot, but there are time when nothing else will do what I need. So far the Dewalt has worked very well. Looking forward to using it in the next season of shows. I've got other Dewalt tools that use the same battery, made sense to build up my Dewalt tools since others needed replacement. This was an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Mostrom

customer_reviews.title: This one's perfect. Blade quick change feature is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Owned a cheaper corded oscillating tool that was loud, blades had to be wrenched in and never seated well. This one's perfect. Blade quick change feature is awesome, very secure and NO CORD. Oscillating tools are a must have. Lifesaver/time-saver for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Joe K

customer_reviews.title: Saved me hours of work, and practically paid for itself.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased specifically to remove old caulk. Saved me potentially hours of work compared to hand tools, in fact, that one job probably paid for itself. I'm chose to go entirely with Dewalt for my tools, and I regret nothing. Excellent addition to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Laxoman

customer_reviews.title: One serious tool.
customer_reviews.text: Used it day after I received it. Works great. You can feel that this is one serious tool. Gives plenty of options.
customer_reviews.author: Mike T

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: A great tool to have for various uses. Good quality DeWalt tool to add with all of the other 20v tools for work.
customer_reviews.author: Beetlekill

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to have
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item, came well packaged with storage bag. Easy to use, sturdy and had everything including battery and charger.
customer_reviews.author: K Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, fantastic price
customer_reviews.text: I'm a die hard milwaukee guy and have a few tools with one battery system. When looking for a multitool, it was clear they dropped the ball and dewalt was the superior tool. No tool needed to change blades and brushless made this the buy for me. I've used it a few times already and enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Probably my new favorite tool
customer_reviews.text: Used this tool regularly for a remodel. This came in handy in all kinds of ways. Another quality DeWalt product. I bought a huge pack of attachments and throw them out after the teeth wear down.
customer_reviews.author: Politicking

customer_reviews.title: Handy lil bugger
customer_reviews.text: My first multi tool - and its a handy little bugger. I already had a ton of 20v dewat tools so this was an easy fit for me. Used it to cut the basboard and casing while doing a tile bathroom and its an impressive little tool
customer_reviews.author: MrAurora

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool. I’ve used it multiple times over the last few months while working on various projects. It balances well in my hand. It’s great for getting into tight spots that would otherwise be a real challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery M.

customer_reviews.title: A great investment!
customer_reviews.text: One of the easiest tools you will ever use. Its very versatile, and safe to handle, making cuts with precision.
customer_reviews.author: Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Recommended! Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical about the cordless performance but decided to to give it a try! Glad I did , sure surprised me !
customer_reviews.author: Jim Woody

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile in DIY projects.
customer_reviews.text: Have to use two hands since vibration causes arm accuracy issues. Have too get use to loud screeching noise level (especially indoors).
customer_reviews.author: m. fung

customer_reviews.title: Typical DeWalt, Good Tool
customer_reviews.text: Typical DeWalt tool, well made. I like the fact that it has a 20V battery which goes with my other tools (I standardized on 20). Have not had a chance to use it a lot but it will certainly help sanding in corners. The case is what they are going to now, a soft one. I used to like the old clamshell, but I guess cost drives this. But it is still better than nothing on bare models.
customer_reviews.author: PL1 Pgrmr

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Do It All
customer_reviews.text: This is one fantastic , multi-use tool. It is hard to believe all that can be done with this tool. I have replaced broken deck boards with it by making a plunge cut through the old wood . I used the sanding attachment to cure a couple of sticking doors. I used the "E" (everything) blade to cut through old paint that was sealing a couple of widows. If you don't ever buy another tool , you must have this ONE.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well built
customer_reviews.text: It just works. Does what I've asked of it repeatedly o er the last couple weeks remodeling.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. You can never go wrong with dewalt. I stick to this company and they’re products last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First tool a defect.  Second tool runs as it should.
customer_reviews.text: First one I received either had defective switch or bad motor. The tool would sporadically slowdown for no reason even holding the switch fully down. Returned it and received second one and currently works like it should. I have not used it on any jobs yet but will update once I do. Not great quality control by dewalt. Its made in China so be forewarned.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for a home owner like myself
customer_reviews.text: For the price they should add more accessories but all in all it’s an amazing tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could not live without it
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing. If you're tearing up linoleum and the backer sticks to the floor (as it should it if was installed properly), this tool is worth its weight in gold. I continue to find lots of other uses for house projects as well.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

product_meta.title: DEWALT 20V MAX XR Oscillating Tool Kit, Brushless, 28 Pieces (DCS355D1)
product_meta.description: Style:Old ModelThe DEWALT DCS355D1 20V MAX XR Lithium-Ion Oscillating Multi-Tool Kit (2.0 Ah) features a DEWALT brushless motor that delivers up to 57% more run time over brushed. The special QUICK-CHANGE accessory system allows blades and attachments to be changed quickly and without wrenches. A DUAL-GRIP variable speed trigger gives users ultimate speed and application control and a bright LED light illuminates dark work surfaces for accurate cutting. This unit also features the DEWALT Oscillating Tool Guide System which allows users to set the depth or height for a series of cuts. The 28-piece accessory kit includes popular cutting and sanding attachments and also has a universal accessory adaptor for use with most oscillating tool accessory brands. Includes: (1) DCS355 20V MAX XR Oscillating Tool, (1) DCB203: 20V MAX XR Compact Li Ion Battery (2.0Ah), (1) fast charger, (1) DEWALT Oscillating Tool Guide System, (1) Wood/Metal Cutting Blade, (1) Wood Fast-cut Blade, (1) sanding pad, (25) sheets of sanding paper, (1) universal accessory adaptor, (1) contractor bag and an accessory storage box. Oscillations/min: 0-20,000 OPM
feature_bullets: DEWALT brushless motor delivers up to 57 percent more run time over brushed
Quick Change accessory system allows blades and attachments to be changed quickly without wrenches
28 Piece DEWALT accessory kit with storage box includes popular cutting and sanding attachments
Universal accessory adaptor for use with most oscillating tool accessory brands
Contractor bag, 2.0 Ah battery, and charger included

specifications.Included Components: 1 DCB203: 20V MAX XR Compact Li Ion Battery
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,547 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
